page.title: 11ONE DAY IN WOOBURN GREEN
page.content: A Day In The Life Of Louisa I get up at 0730,I'm ready for school by 0845.School begins at 0900.In assembly we hear a story,sing a hymn and pray.Next we work at French and English until playtime.After break there is an hour of maths.This is a mathematical process which we have to work out using different methods .Next we eat lunch, which comes from school or home.Then we have art when we paint pictures,craft,games or history.Then a last break followed by geography.School ends and we go home or stay for a swim.Next I play badminton at a club,before having supper at home. Then I learn Road Safety on a bicycle. Finally I go to bed at 2100.
